abstract: At an industry conference on Tuesday, the founding partner of Apollo Global Management was optimistic about private equity, provided the economy remained on track.
snippet: At an industry conference on Tuesday, the founding partner of Apollo Global Management was optimistic about private equity, provided the economy remained on track.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Private equity has reason to be optimistic. Deal-making continues to be strong, and the market for initial public offerings is experiencing a modest revival.
